sql_query.sql: SELECT "catalogue_productattributevalue"."id", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."attribute_id", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."product_id", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_text", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_integer", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_boolean", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_float", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_richtext", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_date", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_datetime", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_option_id", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_file", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."value_image", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."entity_content_type_id", "catalogue_productattributevalue"."entity_object_id", "catalogue_productattribute"."code" AS "code", "catalogue_productattribute"."id", "catalogue_productattribute"."product_class_id", "catalogue_productattribute"."name", "catalogue_productattribute"."code", "catalogue_productattribute"."type", "catalogue_productattribute"."option_group_id", "catalogue_productattribute"."required" FROM "catalogue_productattributevalue" INNER JOIN "catalogue_productattribute" ON ("catalogue_productattributevalue"."attribute_id" = "catalogue_productattribute"."id") WHERE "catalogue_productattributevalue"."product_id" = 4 ORDER BY "catalogue_productattributevalue"."id" ASC

SELECT "catalogue_attributeoption"."id", "catalogue_attributeoption"."group_id", "catalogue_attributeoption"."option" FROM "catalogue_attributeoption" INNER JOIN "catalogue_productattributevalue_value_multi_option" ON ("catalogue_attributeoption"."id" = "catalogue_productattributevalue_value_multi_option"."attributeoption_id") WHERE "catalogue_productattributevalue_value_multi_option"."productattributevalue_id" = 11
